await box.store(5)
const box = await Box.attach('0x425668350bD782D80D457d5F9bc7782A24B8c2ef');
const Box = await ethers.getContractFactory('Box');
(await box.retrieve()).toNumber()
await box.store(5)
const box = await Box.attach('0x425668350bD782D80D457d5F9bc7782A24B8c2ef');
const Box = await ethers.getContractFactory('Box');
